top.title: Trump's theatrical State of the Union address offers little hint of any change in course
top.summary: The BBC's Anthony Zurcher says the US president appealed to his base and taunted his opponents in a marathon speech.

top.title: Japan to deploy missiles on island near Taiwan by 2031
top.summary: The remote Yonaguni island lies on the frontlines of self-governing Taiwan's growing tensions with China.

top.title: Chinese dance group's tour triggers bomb threat against Australian PM
top.summary: The group was told to cancel its performances or explosives would be set off at Anthony Albanese's house.

top.title: Not even potholes will hold up self-driving cars, UK firm predicts
top.summary: Wayve says it's confident all cars will one day be autonomous, as it announced more than a £1bn in additional investment.

top.title: Gucci criticised for 'AI slop' images ahead of major fashion show
top.summary: Users of social media - where the marketing campaign has been launched - say it is out of keeping with Gucci's reputation for luxury.

top.title: Discord delays age verification plans after user outcry
top.summary: Users were unhappy about plans for age verification to require facial or ID scans.

title.#text: Honor’s new MagicPad 4 is the world’s thinnest Android tablet
Pete Hegseth’s Pentagon AI bro squad includes a former Uber executive and a private equity billionaire
Apple’s new age verification tools block underage app downloads where required by law
